    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Potencias</string>
            <string language="en">Powers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Puissances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Potências</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Potenzi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de potencia. Se estudian las propiedades de las potencias para números naturales.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of power. The properties of powers of natural numbers are studied.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">base</string>
            <string language="en">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">exponente</string>
            <string language="en">exponent</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">propiedad</string>
            <string language="en">property</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">potencia</string>
            <string language="en">power</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">número</string>
            <string language="en">number</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der Energie zu erklären. Die 
Eigenschaften von Energien der natürlichen Zahlen werden studiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept de la puissance. Les 
propriétés des puissances des nombres normaux sont étudiées.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito da potência. As propriedades das potências de 
números naturais são estudadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto di potenza. Le proprietà delle potenzi dei
numeri naturali sono studiate.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια της δύναμης. Οι ιδιότητες των 
δυνάμεων των φυσικών αριθμών μελετώνται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterseite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Exponent</string>
          </keyword>
